EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Boston SI Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Thursday, June 29 at Pivotal Partner Days, Boston!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend Pivotal Partner Days <[[https://pivotal.io/event/partner-days/boston/system-integrator-workshop]]> taking place in Boston.
Below you will find some helpful information about the event:
Location: Cambridge Innovation Center 1 Broadway 20th Floor, Cambridge, MA 02142 Map & Directions <[[https://goo.gl/maps/av6Hw5pkQtr]]>
Building Access: Upon arrival, take the elevator to the 20th of the building to check-in. The event will begin promptly at 11:00am. Please arrive 15 minutes early to check in.
Space is limited for this event, so if you are no longer able to attend, we ask that you kindly let us know so that we may fill your spot.
Questions? Please contact Andrew Mackenzie at amackenzie@pivotal.io <[[mailto:amackenzie@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you this week!
- Pivotal Partner Alliances Team
